t: The Fulham Group, A Cuisinart® Brand Licensee, Introduces Range Of New Outdoor Grilling Products, Including a Global Innovation Award Finalist Griddle
s: March 1, 2019 - CHICAGO, March 1, 2019 /PRNewswire/ -- The Fulham Group, a Cuisinart® brand licensee, announces the official launch of its 2019 outdoor grilling product line, including the 360° Griddle Cooking Center, which has been named as a Finalist in the International Home & Housewares' 2019 Global Innovations Awards. t: The Fulham Group is now Cuisinart Outdoors
s: As of August 31, 2023, Conair LLC has acquired The Fulham Group. The Fulham Group is now Cuisinart Outdoors.
